prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a sleek, angular body and glowing features.
Generate a legendary creature that harnesses the power of light and darkness in its design.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the balance between psychic energies and shadowy forms.
Show me a mythical being that can manipulate light and has a cosmic aesthetic.
Design a unique Pokemon that has a celestial theme and sharp, contrasting colors.
Give me an idea for a large, winged Pokemon with a mysterious aura and intricate details.
Make a Pokemon that represents the duality of light and dark within its visual traits.

distinctive_features: Dark, glossy surface with luminous accents
